sense.def:
A tack
je kratek žebelj s široko ravno glavo.

cit.quote: žebljiček s ploščato glavico, risalni žebljiček

sense.def:
To tack something to a surface
pomeni nekaj pritrditi na določeno površino z žebljički.

seg.quote: Gretchen had tacked some travel posters on the wall.

sense.def:
To change tack
ali
to try a different tack
pomeni preskusiti postopek, ki se razlikuje od tistega, ki smo ga uporabljali prej.

seg.quote: They didn't seem convinced so I tried another tack.

sense.def:
To tack something on to something else
pomeni nekaj dodati prej obstoječemu, vendar na nezadovoljiv način.

seg.quote: They've tacked a couple of new clauses on to the end of the contract.
